item.description:
Get rid of the Humbug energy that might be rolling around in your life!

Come to learn the tools on how to keep your self happy, high and tuned in!

Whether it is Merry Christmas, Happy Hanukkah, or a Happy Holidays there should be joy, fun and appreciation running through your December. Everyone has something to be thankful for, it is just more difficult for people who can’t see, feel or hear the good stuff.

We will learn how to extract great times out of the season no matter how hard it has seemed in the past. We will cover mediation and visualization during our program.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Holiday Apprecitation- Jumping into Joy No Matter What!
